data.title: Christopher Eccleston: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Christopher Eccleston: Check out the list of all Christopher Eccleston movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Christopher Eccleston news on Times of India.
data.text:
'True Detective' S4 adds John Hawkes, Christopher Eccleston, Fiona Shaw

PTI / Sep 24, 2022, 12:07 (IST)

Actors John Hawkes, Christopher Eccleston and Fiona Shaw have joined the cast of HBO's "True Detective" season four. Led by Jodie Foster and Kali Reis, the new season of the anthology crime drama has been titled "True Detective: Night Country". According to an entertainment news outlet , actors Finn Bennett and Anna Lambe have also boarded the project.

Doctor Who' season 13 teaser reveals Halloween premiere date

ANI / Oct 10, 2021, 16:50 (IST)

A new teaser for the upcoming thirteenth season of 'Doctor Who' has been unveiled, revealing an official premiere date and giving a glimpse of what to expect from the show as series star Jodie Whittaker begins her final run in the role of the eponymous Time Lord.

Christopher Eccleston first sparked Jodie Whittaker's interest in 'Doctor Who'

PTI / Aug 14, 2017, 12:11 (IST)

Actor Jodie Whittaker has revealed that it was Christopher Eccleston, who first sparked her interest in the show, "Doctor Who".

'Wonder Woman' star Connie Nielsen joins Kaley Cuoco in 'Role Play'

ANI / Jul 16, 2022, 14:13 (IST)

Hollywood actress Connie Nielsen will be a part of the thriller ‘Role Play’ opposite Kaley Cuoco, David Oyelowo and Bill Nighy. The details of Nielsen’s role in the movie are under wraps. The movie helmed by Thomas Vincent revolves around a married couple (Cuoco and Oyelowo) whose lives turn upside down when secrets come out about each other’s pasts. Nighy portrays a mysterious stranger who comes into their lives.

Prince Harry, Kate Middleton's phones were hacked

TNN / Dec 20, 2013, 05:49 (IST)

A trial into allegations that staff working for Rupert Murdoch's News of the World (NoW) hacked phones of several leading personalities revealed on Thursday that the phones of Prince Harry and his elder brother Prince William's wife Kate were also targeted.
